channel.title: How fucked up is this
channel.description: Today me and my pimps went to the mall first, we played hide and seek upstairs in Dillards and got kicked out... for mostly running and shit. second, we pissed off this really fat guy and they started chasing us and we ran like hell because we were afraid he'd sit on us.. and thirdly we went into macy's played hide and seek but we were like stomping on the escalators and we got kicked out, but on the way out my 2 other friends started back talking and they called security and i ran away, and my other 3 friends ran away and got chased like hell they ran across the huge parking lot and went to chilli's. i ran to the other side of the mall and called them. isn't this shit fucked up?

Today me and my pimps went to the mall first, we played hide and seek upstairs in Dillards and got kicked out… for mostly running and shit. second, we pissed off this really fat guy and they started chasing us and we ran like hell because we were afraid he’d sit on us… and thirdly we went into macy’s played hide and seek but we were like stomping on the escalators and we got kicked out, but on the way out my 2 other friends started back talking and they called security and i ran away, and my other 3 friends ran away and got chased like hell they ran across the huge parking lot and went to chilli’s. i ran to the other side of the mall and called them. isn’t this shit fucked up?
